title: What bad experiences have you had in coaching classes? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A. I was in no mood of studying that day. So i told sir before the class began that i had an upset stomach. He asked me to go home and rest Next day, I came late, everyone was already seated. He saw me entering and said, “Did your upset stomach made you come late”. !! Everyone burst into laughter, and teased me saying the same words whenever I was late for something!! Peace!!
